nodes.text: The Deep Core Security Zone was a restricted area of Imperial space in the Deep Core that included the planet Byss within the Beshqek system. Despite the Imperial Center being the seat of Emperor Palpatine's power, evidence seems to point to the Security Zone having always been an easily defended fallback position for the Galactic Empire.
In the months following the end of the Clone Wars, hundreds of Imperial warships blockaded the region.
